sentences.sContent: He greeted me with a handshake and a glass of wine.
sentences.sCn: 他与我握手问候，并递给我一杯酒。

sentences.sContent: Her handshake was warm and firm.

words.tran: 握手；[计][通信] 信号交换

trans.tranOther: the act of taking someone’s right hand and shaking it, which people do when they meet or leave each other or when they have made an agreement
